body.p: Consequently, the Board decided to amend paragraph 80(a) to state that:

li.p: the gross carrying amount is adjusted in a manner that is consistent with the revaluation of the carrying amount; and
the accumulated amortisation is calculated as the difference between the gross carrying amount and the carrying amount after taking into account accumulated impairment losses.

body.p: The Board also decided to amend paragraph 80(b) to be consistent with the wording used in those amendments.
